content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -29.5, 30.5), boiler (position -24.5, -50.0), and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) and inserter (position not specified) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position not specified) that connects the furnace at position -18.0, -49.0 to the assembling machine

### Labs
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position not specified) with no power

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to electricity connections
- Ensure that all electric poles are properly connected to the power network to avoid "not connected to power network" errors. Check the status of nearby electric poles and their connections.

### Errors when using attributes of entities
- Avoid accessing attributes that do not exist for certain entity types, such as 'voltage' for the ElectricityGroup. Always verify the available attributes for an entity before attempting to access them.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the target position.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
